thought: To craft diorite_slab, I need to first craft diorite. To craft diorite, I need to place cobblestone and quartz in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will first move the cobblestone from slot 21 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: To craft diorite_slab, I need to first craft diorite. To craft diorite, I need to place cobblestone and quartz in the crafting grid. The cobblestone and quartz have already been placed in the crafting grid, and therefore I will now move the crafted diorite from the crafting grid to a free inventory slot. Diorite is located at slot 0, and therefore I will move it to slot 11.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 2

inventory=[{"type": "diorite", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 45, "index": 13}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 2, "index": 14}, {"type": "gray_banner", "quantity": 2, "index": 19}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 2, "index": 21}, {"type": "warped_nylium", "quantity": 28, "index": 22}, {"type": "lapis_ore", "quantity": 57, "index": 25}, {"type": "brown_mushroom", "quantity": 14, "index": 36}, {"type": "bowl", "quantity": 57, "index": 39}, {"type": "magenta_concrete", "quantity": 34, "index": 43}, {"type": "rotten_flesh", "quantity": 8, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft diorite slabs, I first need to craft diorite. To do so, I need to place 1 cobblestone and 2 quartz blocks side by side in the crafting grid. The cobblestone is in slot 21, and therefore I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 2 with quantity 1
